briefDescription: AAI foundation has been working since 12 years through SAHARA ANATHALAYA PARIWAR in GEORAI (BEED DIST) to rehabilitate under-privileged children. We aim to provide basic necessity to •Orphan Children/ Children of farmer who committed suicide. •Sex workers children•Prisoners children,helpless,deprived,& ignored children
